name: Booking
description: Booking object refers to a confirmed booking

columns.name: bookingStatus
columns.description: Status of the Booking - Status of the Booking

columns.name: updateBookingOptionRequests
columns.description: References to BookingOptionRequests that request to update the Booking

columns.name: checks
columns.description: References to the CheckActions performed on the object

columns.name: waybillNumber
columns.description: House or Master Waybill unique identifier

columns.name: waybillPrefix
columns.description: Prefix used for the Waybill Number. Refer to IATA Airlines Codes

columns.name: skeletonIndicator
columns.description: Indicator whether a logistics object is a skeleton object

columns.name: activitySequences
columns.description: Information about the Activities that are part of the Service and their sequence

columns.name: contactPersons
columns.description: References to Actors (Person; NonHumanActor) acting as contacts - References to Actors (Person; NonHumanActor) acting as contacts
